name: Rose Riddle: The Fairytale Detective - Collector's Edition
summary: Rose Riddle - The Fairy Tale Detective is a magical time management adventure. Join Rose as a rendezvous with her missing parents soon becomes an unexpected excursion to a fairy tale realm! Manage resources, race the clock, and unlock bonus content as you embark on a comical adventure. Play Rose Riddle - The Fairy Tale Detective today!
